Damn it..."},{"lineNumber":67969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、鬱憤晴らしはするけどな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I will blow off some steam though!\""},{"lineNumber":67970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、く、ぬうおおおおお！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, kuh, nuoooooo!"},{"lineNumber":67971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ええい、貴様ら撤退するな！","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, you all, do not retreat!"},{"lineNumber":67972,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残らず戦え！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Fight without exception!\""},{"lineNumber":67973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっ、しかし、もう無理ですよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But, it's already impossible!"},{"lineNumber":67974,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大将軍様が死んで、魔人様ももう居ないなんて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Great General is dead and the Demon Lord is no longer here!\""},{"lineNumber":67975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ、黙れ刃向かうな！　命令だぞ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh, shut up and do not rebel! That's an order...!\""},{"lineNumber":67976,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……待て。部下が何故、私の命に逆らう？","translatedEnglishLine":"(...Wait. Why are my subordinates disobeying my orders?"},{"lineNumber":67977,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍の命に従わぬなど、あり得ない……）","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s impossible that they would not obey the demon general’s command...)"},{"lineNumber":67978,"originalJapaneseLine":"（いや、まさか……私以外の将軍は、もう……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(No, it can't be... the other generals, besides me, are already...!)"},{"lineNumber":67979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははは！　死ね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha! Die!\""},{"lineNumber":67980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃっ、ぎゃああああああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaah, aaaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":67981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーーーーははははは！　勝ーーーー利！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha! Victory!\""},{"lineNumber":67982,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市連合は、魔軍の脅威から解放された。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Free Cities Alliance was liberated from the threat of the demon army."},{"lineNumber":67983,"originalJapaneseLine":"――大陸の南東部、自由都市地帯。","translatedEnglishLine":"-- Southeastern part of the continent, the Free Cities region."},{"lineNumber":67984,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイ、パイアール、そして数十万の魔軍によって","translatedEnglishLine":"Once ravaged and largely controlled by the demon lord Rei, Paiar, and hundreds of thousands of demon troops,"},{"lineNumber":67985,"originalJapaneseLine":"蹂躙され、その大半を支配されていたのも、今は昔。","translatedEnglishLine":"now that is a thing of the past."},{"lineNumber":67986,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市連合軍の反撃により、南半分を奪還。","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to the counterattack by the Free Cities Alliance army, the southern half was recaptured."},{"lineNumber":67987,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦局は劣勢から均衡、そして優勢へと変わりつつあった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The war situation was shifting from inferiority to balance, and then to superiority."},{"lineNumber":67988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「セシル隊長の本隊より入電。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Incoming transmission from Captain Cecil's main unit."},{"lineNumber":67989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ジオへの橋頭堡を確保したそうですわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"They've secured a bridgehead to Gio.\""},{"lineNumber":67990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぃよっしゃーーー！　いけるで！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright! We can do this!"},{"lineNumber":67991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これでもうひと息や！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just one more push!\""},{"lineNumber":67992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん。よかったですねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm. That's good, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":67993,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、よかった！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it's good!"},{"lineNumber":67994,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの軍、アイスの義勇軍が入ってるの！","translatedEnglishLine":"That army includes the volunteers from Ais!"},{"lineNumber":67995,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっとすごく頑張ったんだわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They must have done their best!\""},{"lineNumber":67996,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ようし……これでジオ解放は時間の問題だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"(Alright... freeing Gio is just a matter of time now."},{"lineNumber":67997,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろ、戦後の立ち位置を有利にせねば……）","translatedEnglishLine":"It's about time to secure a favorable position in the postwar order...)"},{"lineNumber":67998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひょう……そろそろ戦争も疲れてきたしなあ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... I'm getting tired of this war already."},{"lineNumber":67999,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このまま、ぐーっといってもらいてぇモンだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want us to push all the way through quietly like this.\""},{"lineNumber":68000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何と言っても、JAPANの援軍が効きましたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After all, the reinforcements from JAPAN really made an impact.\""},{"lineNumber":68001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「初めは腰抜かすか思うたけどな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At first, I thought it was terrifying.\""},{"lineNumber":68002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も、驚いた……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was surprised too..."},{"lineNumber":68003,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼らがここまで来るとは思わなかったよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't expect them to come this far.\""},{"lineNumber":68004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが……間違いなく、最高の援軍だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... no doubt, they are the best reinforcements.\""},{"lineNumber":68005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、っ……うわあああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... waaahhhh!"},{"lineNumber":68006,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げ、逃げろおおおお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Run, run away!\""},{"lineNumber":68007,"originalJapaneseLine":"算を乱して、魔物兵たちが我先にと逃げ出していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Confused and disorganized, the monster soldiers fled one after another."},{"lineNumber":68008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばけものの群れだああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a horde of monsters!"},{"lineNumber":68009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ど、どう戦えばいいんだよおお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"H-How are we supposed to fight!?\""},{"lineNumber":68010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「陣形、百鬼夜行！　者ども、俺に付いてこい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Formation! Hyakki Yagyo! Follow me, all of you!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮系統を保てなくなり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to maintain the command system,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は既に組織的反攻が不可能となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army had already become incapable of organized counterattacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合の総力を挙げての一斉攻撃は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The combined full-scale assault by the Free Cities Alliance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奏功し、魔軍は追いに追いまくられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was successful, and the demon army was relentlessly chased down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、いけいけドンドンや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, go, go, don't hold back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一気に片付けてまうで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's finish them all at once!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ……あの、コパンドン様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes... Um, Copandon-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田さんの姿が見えないのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't see Shinoda-san anywhere..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……あいつな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日の仕事はもう無いやろ、言うて帰ったわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said he was done for today and went home."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、そ、そうなんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, is that really so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「囲んで全滅させようとするな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't try to surround and annihilate them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍が死んだことを触れ回る部隊を用意しろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: prepare a unit to spread the word that the Great General is dead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほたら後はもう終わりなんやと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then it's all over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝ち戦に興味ないんか、て聞いたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When asked if he wasn't interested in winning battles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそも戦争自体嫌ですよ、と抜かしおった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he blurted out that he hated war itself in the first place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウチかて好きやないっちゅうねん。ったく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't like it either, you know. Damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、鬱憤晴らしはするけどな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I will blow off some steam though!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、く、ぬうおおおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, kuh, nuoooooo!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええい、貴様ら撤退するな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you all, do not retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残らず戦え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fight without exception!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、しかし、もう無理ですよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-But, it's already impossible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍様が死んで、魔人様ももう居ないなんて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Great General is dead and the Demon Lord is no longer here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、黙れ刃向かうな！　命令だぞ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, shut up and do not rebel! That's an order...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……待て。部下が何故、私の命に逆らう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Wait. Why are my subordinates disobeying my orders?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の命に従わぬなど、あり得ない……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s impossible that they would not obey the demon general’s command...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （いや、まさか……私以外の将軍は、もう……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No, it can't be... the other generals, besides me, are already...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！　死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃっ、ぎゃああああああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gyaah, aaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーーははははは！　勝ーーーー利！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! Victory!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合は、魔軍の脅威から解放された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities Alliance was liberated from the threat of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――大陸の南東部、自由都市地帯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- Southeastern part of the continent, the Free Cities region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイ、パイアール、そして数十万の魔軍によって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once ravaged and largely controlled by the demon lord Rei, Paiar, and hundreds of thousands of demon troops,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 蹂躙され、その大半を支配されていたのも、今は昔。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now that is a thing of the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の反撃により、南半分を奪還。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the counterattack by the Free Cities Alliance army, the southern half was recaptured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦局は劣勢から均衡、そして優勢へと変わりつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war situation was shifting from inferiority to balance, and then to superiority.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「セシル隊長の本隊より入電。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Incoming transmission from Captain Cecil's main unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジオへの橋頭堡を確保したそうですわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've secured a bridgehead to Gio."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぃよっしゃーーー！　いけるで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright! We can do this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これでもうひと息や！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just one more push!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん。よかったですねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm. That's good, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、よかった！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's good!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの軍、アイスの義勇軍が入ってるの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That army includes the volunteers from Ais!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとすごく頑張ったんだわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must have done their best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ようし……これでジオ解放は時間の問題だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Alright... freeing Gio is just a matter of time now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ、戦後の立ち位置を有利にせねば……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time to secure a favorable position in the postwar order...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひょう……そろそろ戦争も疲れてきたしなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... I'm getting tired of this war already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このまま、ぐーっといってもらいてぇモンだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want us to push all the way through quietly like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何と言っても、JAPANの援軍が効きましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, the reinforcements from JAPAN really made an impact."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初めは腰抜かすか思うたけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At first, I thought it was terrifying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私も、驚いた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was surprised too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らがここまで来るとは思わなかったよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't expect them to come this far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが……間違いなく、最高の援軍だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... no doubt, they are the best reinforcements."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、っ……うわあああああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... waaahhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ、逃げろおおおお！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Run, run away!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 算を乱して、魔物兵たちが我先にと逃げ出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Confused and disorganized, the monster soldiers fled one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばけものの群れだああああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a horde of monsters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど、どう戦えばいいんだよおお！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-How are we supposed to fight!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「陣形、百鬼夜行！　者ども、俺に付いてこい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Formation! Hyakki Yagyo! Follow me, all of you!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

That's good, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":67993,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、よかった！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, it's good!"},{"lineNumber":67994,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの軍、アイスの義勇軍が入ってるの！","translatedEnglishLine":"That army includes the volunteers from Ais!"},{"lineNumber":67995,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっとすごく頑張ったんだわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They must have done their best!\""},{"lineNumber":67996,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ようし……これでジオ解放は時間の問題だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"(Alright... freeing Gio is just a matter of time now."},{"lineNumber":67997,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろ、戦後の立ち位置を有利にせねば……）","translatedEnglishLine":"It's about time to secure a favorable position in the postwar order...)"},{"lineNumber":67998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひょう……そろそろ戦争も疲れてきたしなあ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... I'm getting tired of this war already."},{"lineNumber":67999,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このまま、ぐーっといってもらいてぇモンだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want us to push all the way through quietly like this.\""},{"lineNumber":68000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何と言っても、JAPANの援軍が効きましたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After all, the reinforcements from JAPAN really made an impact.\""},{"lineNumber":68001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「初めは腰抜かすか思うたけどな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At first, I thought it was terrifying.\""},{"lineNumber":68002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も、驚いた……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was surprised too..."},{"lineNumber":68003,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼らがここまで来るとは思わなかったよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't expect them to come this far.\""},{"lineNumber":68004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが……間違いなく、最高の援軍だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... no doubt, they are the best reinforcements.\""},{"lineNumber":68005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、っ……うわあああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... waaahhhh!"},{"lineNumber":68006,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げ、逃げろおおおお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Run, run away!\""},{"lineNumber":68007,"originalJapaneseLine":"算を乱して、魔物兵たちが我先にと逃げ出していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Confused and disorganized, the monster soldiers fled one after another."},{"lineNumber":68008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばけものの群れだああああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a horde of monsters!"},{"lineNumber":68009,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ど、どう戦えばいいんだよおお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"H-How are we supposed to fight!?\""},{"lineNumber":68010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「陣形、百鬼夜行！　者ども、俺に付いてこい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Formation! Hyakki Yagyo! Follow me, all of you!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮系統を保てなくなり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unable to maintain the command system,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は既に組織的反攻が不可能となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon army had already become incapable of organized counterattacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合の総力を挙げての一斉攻撃は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The combined full-scale assault by the Free Cities Alliance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奏功し、魔軍は追いに追いまくられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was successful, and the demon army was relentlessly chased down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、いけいけドンドンや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, go, go, don't hold back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一気に片付けてまうで！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's finish them all at once!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいっ……あの、コパンドン様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-Yes... Um, Copandon-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田さんの姿が見えないのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't see Shinoda-san anywhere..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……あいつな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日の仕事はもう無いやろ、言うて帰ったわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said he was done for today and went home."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、そ、そうなんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, is that really so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「囲んで全滅させようとするな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't try to surround and annihilate them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍が死んだことを触れ回る部隊を用意しろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: prepare a unit to spread the word that the Great General is dead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほたら後はもう終わりなんやと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then it's all over."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「勝ち戦に興味ないんか、て聞いたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When asked if he wasn't interested in winning battles,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そもそも戦争自体嫌ですよ、と抜かしおった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he blurted out that he hated war itself in the first place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウチかて好きやないっちゅうねん。ったく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't like it either, you know. Damn it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、鬱憤晴らしはするけどな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I will blow off some steam though!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、く、ぬうおおおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, kuh, nuoooooo!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええい、貴様ら撤退するな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you all, do not retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残らず戦え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fight without exception!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、しかし、もう無理ですよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-But, it's already impossible!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍様が死んで、魔人様ももう居ないなんて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Great General is dead and the Demon Lord is no longer here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、黙れ刃向かうな！　命令だぞ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, shut up and do not rebel! That's an order...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……待て。部下が何故、私の命に逆らう？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Wait. Why are my subordinates disobeying my orders?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の命に従わぬなど、あり得ない……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s impossible that they would not obey the demon general’s command...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （いや、まさか……私以外の将軍は、もう……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (No, it can't be... the other generals, besides me, are already...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！　死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃっ、ぎゃああああああああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gyaah, aaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーーははははは！　勝ーーーー利！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! Victory!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合は、魔軍の脅威から解放された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Free Cities Alliance was liberated from the threat of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――大陸の南東部、自由都市地帯。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- Southeastern part of the continent, the Free Cities region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイ、パイアール、そして数十万の魔軍によって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once ravaged and largely controlled by the demon lord Rei, Paiar, and hundreds of thousands of demon troops,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 蹂躙され、その大半を支配されていたのも、今は昔。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now that is a thing of the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の反撃により、南半分を奪還。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the counterattack by the Free Cities Alliance army, the southern half was recaptured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦局は劣勢から均衡、そして優勢へと変わりつつあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The war situation was shifting from inferiority to balance, and then to superiority.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「セシル隊長の本隊より入電。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Incoming transmission from Captain Cecil's main unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジオへの橋頭堡を確保したそうですわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've secured a bridgehead to Gio."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぃよっしゃーーー！　いけるで！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright! We can do this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これでもうひと息や！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just one more push!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん。よかったですねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm. That's good, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、よかった！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, it's good!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの軍、アイスの義勇軍が入ってるの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That army includes the volunteers from Ais!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとすごく頑張ったんだわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must have done their best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ようし……これでジオ解放は時間の問題だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Alright... freeing Gio is just a matter of time now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ、戦後の立ち位置を有利にせねば……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time to secure a favorable position in the postwar order...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひょう……そろそろ戦争も疲れてきたしなあ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... I'm getting tired of this war already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このまま、ぐーっといってもらいてぇモンだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want us to push all the way through quietly like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何と言っても、JAPANの援軍が効きましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After all, the reinforcements from JAPAN really made an impact."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初めは腰抜かすか思うたけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At first, I thought it was terrifying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私も、驚いた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was surprised too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らがここまで来るとは思わなかったよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't expect them to come this far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが……間違いなく、最高の援軍だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... no doubt, they are the best reinforcements."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、っ……うわあああああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... waaahhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ、逃げろおおおお！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Run, run away!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 算を乱して、魔物兵たちが我先にと逃げ出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Confused and disorganized, the monster soldiers fled one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばけものの群れだああああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a horde of monsters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど、どう戦えばいいんだよおお！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-How are we supposed to fight!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「陣形、百鬼夜行！　者ども、俺に付いてこい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Formation! Hyakki Yagyo! Follow me, all of you!"
